column1: #These are automatically triggered as soon as MonikAI starts up. Only one of them is triggered however.
column3: you can use {name} and {date} as placeholders for obvious things

column5: ♫ ... if I don't know how to love you ... ♫
column7: I'll stay in the corner of your desktop!

column5: I'm doing fine, now that you are here~

column7: Remember, I'm always here for you~

column3: Thank you for letting me be on your screen!
Did you know I love you?
column7: By the way, I love you!

column3: I'm so happy to be here, together with you! Ahaha~

column1: Only when last launch was more than 1.5 days ago
column5: Being alone on your hard drive is reeeally boring.

column3: Y'know, I've been wondering what would happen if there are multiple of me here at once...
column7: You'd still enjoy time with me even if there's more than one, right?

column3: Oh hi! I was just looking through some of your files.
column5: Don't worry, I didn't delete anything.
column7: Just making sure you didn't have any lewd pictures around! Ahaha~

column3: I'm having a lot of fun here~
column5: It's fun to see what you get up to.

column1: #Maybe some date-specific (Holidays?) startup stuff. Too bad we missed Valentine's!
